mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.memberId, p.location, p.up, p.views, p.tag, p.title, p.content, p.inserted, p.updated, m.nickname FROM tb_board p JOIN tb_user m ON m.id = p.memberId Order By p.id DESC
SELECT id, memberId, location, up, views, tag, title, content, inserted, updated FROM tb_board WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_board (memberId, location, tag, title, content) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{location}, #{tag}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_board SET location = #{location}, tag = #{tag}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
